content: *little girls will love the bright colors and flower pattern of this cheerful set one size fits child 4-8 yrs and 18 doll made in bernat super value yarnspirations * **pattern includes instructions for both child and doll** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ materials **doll s poncho and headscarf** bernat super value hot blue 2¼ oz 60 g hot pink 1 oz 30 g bright yellow 1½ oz 40 g hot lime 1 oz 30 g ultra peach ½ oz 15 g *samples made with bernat so soft jelly bean colors discontinued * sizes g/6 4 mm and h/8 5 mm crochet hooks or size needed for gauge gauge **doll s poncho** basic motif = 2½ ins 6 cm square with size h/8 hook finish with edging fringe and tie cord **doll s headscarf** 16 sts and 10 row = 4 ins 10 cm in pat with size h/8 hook finish with edging and ties assembly diagram is provided in pattern coordinating girl s set 2 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/poncho-set-girls-poncho--headscarf
